name: hexo-helper-live2d
description: Add the Sseexxyyy live2d to your hexo!

scripts.test: echo "Sayly, there's nothing here. ToT" && exit 1
scripts.inst:dev: npm install -g commitizen&&npm install -g cz-conventional-changelog&&npm install -g conventional-changelog-cli&&npm install
scripts.changelog: git pull&&conventional-changelog -i doc/CHANGELOG.md -r 0 -s -u&&git add doc/CHANGELOG.md&&git commit -m "docs: update CHANGELOG"&&git push&&git status
